sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], template: `

Contact Us

Get in touch with us. We're here to help and answer any question you might have.

Get in Touch

Office Address

123 Charity Lane
Suite 100
Help City, HC 12345

Phone

(555) 123-4567

Email

info@legacydonation.org

Business Hours

Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

Send us a Message

`, styles: [] }) export class ContactComponent { title = 'Contact - Legacy Donation'; contactFormData = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }; onSubmit() { console.log('Contact form submitted:', this.contactFormData); alert('Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.'); // Reset form this.contactFormData = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }; } }
